name: Ragdoll City 3D – Boss Beat
description:
Torture the dummy ragdoll in the city and challenge your buddies to earn cash.

One of the best ways of torturing is to throw some one into the gravity and watch him crashing on the wall to all the way down! Cool real world physics made it one of the best sandbox style games.
This game is also live on Amazon and iPhone! If anyone love to play torture or blood style game will love this Ragdoll City too.

Share with your thousands of friends and family members. Have the best torturing fun ever in this ragdoll stickman game of death.
